Hi, dohduhdah-

I've got uTorrent v3. When I click on the magnet torrent link it opens uTorrent and it usually posts the name of the torrent (e.g. "TTC Video - Before 1776") but it always posts zero files in the torrent.

I've tried on several of your uploads and other people's uploads with the same results.

I searched uTorrents forum and, as suggested to another user, I cut-n-pasted the links directly into uTorrent. Didn't work.

Any idea how to fix this?

I really like your uploads and want to download several.

Thanks!
